restaurants.name: Wynwood Kitchen & Bar
restaurants.description: Arts District hot spot with indoor-outdoor dining, famous artists' works & live music.

restaurants.name: Jimmy'z Kitchen Wynwood
restaurants.description: Known for gourmet sandwiches, this colorful counter-serve cafe also offers salads & global mains.

restaurants.name: R House Wynwood
restaurants.description: Vibrant & funky destination featuring globally-inspired eats, infusion cocktails & an art gallery.

restaurants.name: Suviche Wynwood
restaurants.description: Buzzy, casual eatery with Japanese & Peruvian fare, such as sushi & ceviche, plus sake, wine & beer.

restaurants.name: Joey's Italian Cafe
restaurants.description: Hip choice for thin-crust pies & more Italian eats in contemporary digs near local art galleries.

restaurants.name: Alter
restaurants.description: Refined New American fare served up in a spare, industrial setting with an open kitchen & a garden.

restaurants.name: Morgans Restaurant
restaurants.description: Updated takes on homey American staples offered in an unpretentious old house with a covered porch.

restaurants.name: Beaker & Gray
restaurants.description: Global-inspired fare & inventive cocktails served in a former factory space with rustic accents.

restaurants.name: Kyu
restaurants.description: Modern Asian-style eatery offering grilled meats & sashimi, plus cocktails.

restaurants.name: GKBistronomie
restaurants.description: Global-inspired Peruvian seafood & pisco drinks served in chic space with open kitchen & courtyard.

restaurants.name: The Butcher Shop Beer Garden & Grill
restaurants.description: Beer garden-style hangout featuring artisanal meat dishes, craft brews & a butcher shop.

restaurants.name: Coyo Taco
restaurants.description: Upbeat spot (with a hidden bar) for Mexican street food & margaritas made with house-brand tequila.

restaurants.name: Wynwood Diner
restaurants.description: Diner with Euro charm serving all-day breakfast & modernized classics, plus cocktails & craft beer.

restaurants.name: Kush
restaurants.description: Eco-friendly, art-filled gastropub offering scratch-made fare, wine & an eclectic craft beer list.

restaurants.name: Dr Smood - Wynwood Organic Cafe
restaurants.description: Health-conscious cafe offering organic salads, smoothies & coffee drinks in a trendy setting.

restaurants.name: Brick
restaurants.description: A 1920s house is the backdrop for a beer garden with craft brews & bourbon, plus a patio & DJs.

restaurants.name: Prohibition Restaurant and Speakeasy
restaurants.description: Hip speakeasy/eatery with Prohibition-era cocktails, nightlife scene & eclectic comfort food.

restaurants.name: Jucy Lu
restaurants.description: At Jucy Lu we juice, cook and create conscious and healthy eating habits.

restaurants.name: Cafeina
restaurants.description: Funky Wynwood venue luring local hipsters with live bands, eclectic tapas & a spacious patio.

restaurants.name: Pride and Joy BBQ
restaurants.description: Vibrant honky-tonk fixing up BBQ & other classic Southern eats in a space adorned with beer cans.

restaurants.name: Made in Italy Gourmet
restaurants.description: This rustic hybrid boasts a salumeria with Italian fare, a wine bar & a gourmet market.

restaurants.name: Rust Wynwood
restaurants.description: A globally-inspired restaurant located inside a neighborhood gathering hotspot, Wynwood Block.

restaurants.name: The Lunchbox
restaurants.description: Funky, eco-friendly kitchen delivering an international menu in a relaxed, colorful environment.

restaurants.name: Bar Louie
restaurants.address: The Shops at Midtown Miami, 3201 N Miami Ave #210, Miami, FL 33127
restaurants.description: Upbeat grill chain with American grub, martinis & microbrews, plus happy-hour deals.

restaurants.name: Ming Yuan Restaurant
restaurants.description: Casual eatery serving a lengthy menu of traditional Chinese dishes. Delivery is available.

restaurants.name: The Lost and Found Saloon
restaurants.description: Compact Western-themed bar & cafe supplying craft beer plus Southwestern & Mexican fare until 3 AM.

restaurants.name: The Gang Miami
restaurants.description: Fueled by a creative spirit, this hip loftlike eatery serves inventive Asian-fusion fare with flair.

restaurants.name: Novecento Midtown
restaurants.address: The Shops at Midtown Miami, 3201 N Miami Ave #116, Miami, FL 33127
restaurants.description: Bistro chain serving a menu of Argentinian dishes & Italian pastas, plus wine & cocktails.

restaurants.name: El Bajareque
restaurants.description: Low-key, art-filled spot with counter & table seating dishing up Puerto Rican eats & daily specials.
